title: Alex Pandian Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Movie: Alex Pandian
Starring  Karthi, Anushka Shetty and Santhanam 
Directed by Suraj
Music by Devi Sri Prasad

1. Onnam Class => Singers: Mukesh, Priyadarshini=>Lyrics:Vaali
2. Thaka Thayya => Singer: Karthik => Lyrics: Viveka
3. Naalu Pakkam => Singers: DSP, Anitha => Lyrics: Viveka
4. Bad Boy => Singers: Baba Sehgal, Priya Himesh => Lyrics: Karunakaran
5. Rayya Rayya => Singers: Javed Ali, Ranina Reddy =>Lyrics: Pa. Vijay

for pongal release - audio on 12-12-2012 on Rajini's birthday :)
keep you eyes open .
